name: Seitan: Escape Horror Game
description:
Seitan is a puzzle game, you have to find and collect the specified number of items, while looking for the items, the patient's ghost will always wander and disturb.

Player will be given 2 choices between fighting the patient or helping the ghost of the patient find a sedative.

=================

  • Android support
  • Pause menu/setting
  • Localization
  • 2 Ending gameplay
  • 3 different enemies in one building
  • Particle Effects
  • SFX Free license

Instagram : @playkarastd
